title-section1: Webapp for project management and task tracking.
subtitle-section1: FicaLab is a platform for managing your projects and tasks. It allows you to create projects, add tasks to them, and assign tasks to your team members. You can also track the progress of your projects and tasks.
there-you-can-add-and-remove-your-skills: There you can add and remove your skills
do_you_want_to_create_a_new_skill?: Do you want to create a new skill?
there-you-can-add-and-remove-your-intere: There you can add and remove your interests
do_you_want_to_create_a_new_interest?: Do you want to create a new interest?
